content: Prayer for Mercy in Time of Trouble.
To the Chief Musician; on stringed instruments, set [possibly] an octave below. A Psalm of David.
Nor discipline me in Your wrath.
Have mercy on me  be gracious to me, O , for I am weak (faint, frail);
Heal me, O , for my bones are dismayed  anguished.
My soul [as well as my body] is greatly dismayed.
